translated: The Puggala Paṭṭhāna🔽The Dhamma Paṭṭhāna🔽The Dyads

analyzed: dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa vitakka duka
translated: With applied thought: with applied thought and sustained thought: with sustained thought: without applied thought: without sustained thought: with applied thought and sustained thought: without applied thought and without sustained thought:

original: Nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nasavitakkañca naavitakkañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakkaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na avitakkam dhammam paṭicca na avitakkaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na sa vitakkam ca na avitakkam ca dhammam paṭicca na sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
